item.title: Another Ice Barrage Problem :|
item.dc:creator: @h3ll_pure h3ll pure
item.description:
@h3ll_pure wrote:

Hey I was wondering if I posted the codes for my ice barrage someone could tell me what to change so that it works on players also when I barrage an npc ice dosent go around them but the animation is ok though.

Anyway, here is my codes,

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

And,

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic); startAnimation(1979); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

From this I would like to make ice barrage work on players, and also if you can, Make it so ice goes around the npc and/or player when I barrage.

Thanks in advance,

H3ll[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 02:36:33 AM[/size][hr]Pls help peepz
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 07, 2007, 02:42:29 AM[/size][hr]Pls help peepz

Read full topic
